0001.title: The treasure of time
0001.description: Would you waste the best treasure in the world on nonsense? you own it, it's called time, what are you doing with it?

0002.title: Urgent!
0002.description: Let the urgency of the message determine the means to transmit it.

0003.title: Ring
0003.description: Inside the books is where we find the most precious treasures.

0004.title: Rockman
0004.description: Never judge someone for what you can see. Who knows if inside of him there is an amazing world.

0005.title: Stylized Weapons
0005.description: This is the result of a contest from a facebook group, the idea is not mine but I definitely wanted to try when I saw the weapons. The artwork/idea is not mine. The title and artist name is unknown.
